Text: behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy
For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord
The righteous shall flourish like a palm tree
Go to the ant, you sluggard; consider its ways and be wise
Come unto me ... and I will give you rest
He was crushed for our sins
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you.
the night will shine like the day
He was punished so we would have peace
My God sent His angel and shut the lions' mouths
But He was hurt for our wrong-doing.
He was beaten so we would be healed
